titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: YEAR AND MONTH FIRST STARTED ANTIRETROVIRAL THERAPY - Description

div.p: YEAR AND MONTH OF SYMPTOMS ONSET (IMPROVING ACCESS TO PSYCHOLOGICAL THERAPIES) is the same as attribute YEAR AND MONTH OF SYMPTOMS ONSET FOR IMPROVING ACCESS TO PSYCHOLOGICAL THERAPIES.

p.i: For the Improving Access to Psychological Therapies Data Set, it is expected that the PATIENT will always know the year and month that the current mental health problem was first experienced, therefore there is no default code..
